about_the_game:
The Gods are bored.. and they have decided to do battle against each other! By utilizing the greatest fighting factions in history, they do continuous battle for fame and glory! Chosen from the Spartans, Romans, and Vikings, to the Gladiators, Samurai, and Egyptians.. their arena battles are legendary!! Come join in today!

An alternative online trading card game that allows unlimited deck-building and competitors, both AI and live! Three different game modes that include Gauntlet, Solo, and Multiplayer options. Many player and deck customization options to earn and choose from. From Daily/Weekly Quests and Goals, to Login Rewards, Records, and Leaderboards, there is plenty of ways to earn, brag about, and immortalize yourself For the Glory of Gods!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 on PC; AMD Radeon Vega 8
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Alternative online turn-based trading card game, that allows you unlimited deck-building options. Three different game modes, including Solo, Gauntlet, and Multiplayer to choose from! Earn cards, packs, and coins, and try to stay on top of the leaderboards For the Glory of Gods.
